the_question.question: Who was the king of the gods, the god of the sky and thunder, and the equivalent of the Greek god Zeus?
Who was the goddess of love, beauty, and fertility, and the equivalent of the Greek goddess Aphrodite?
Who was the god of the sea, earthquakes, and horses, and the equivalent of the Greek god Poseidon?
Who was the god of war, violence, and bloodshed, and the equivalent of the Greek god Ares?
Who was the goddess of wisdom, strategic warfare, and the equivalent of the Greek goddess Athena?
